lines.text: Until I met you, I never knew how rotten I was.
What's the matter? What's this? You've been kissed before...
What difference does that make? If I'd been married before, would that make you wanna marry me? If I'd been hurt before, would that make you wanna hurt me?
[first lines]
Whaddya say, Joe.
[to Charley]
Boy, this is sure seein' Europe the hard way!
Aw, it's better than dodgin' those sheriffs in Kentucky. Besides, we might do pretty good here.
Hi, lover. Did you miss me?
Miss you? I couldn't eat; couldn't sleep, couldn't drink...
Uh-huh. Couldn't even write, you muscle-bound ape.
Would you mind taking off your dress?
Sometimes there are phrases in English I do not understand. Did you ask me to take my dress off?
Afraid of me?
I'm not afraid of anyone!
[Willy removes her dress and strikes a pose]
Well?
You know what I was thinking?
Probably.
You're wrong. I've been thinking lately the act might go better if I had a partner. That's all. It's just an idea.
